args.natural_language_statement: Let (p_n) be a sequence and f : ‚Ñï ‚Üí ‚Ñï. The sequence (q_k) with q_k = p_{f(k)} is called a rearrangement of (p_n). Show that if f is an injection, the limit of a sequence is unaffected by rearrangement. In Lean: for a topological space Œ±, p : ‚Ñï ‚Üí Œ±, f : ‚Ñï ‚Üí ‚Ñï injective, and a : Œ±, if p ‚Üí a (tendsto p at_top (nhds a)) then the rearranged sequence k ‚Ü¶ p (f k) also tends to a.
